text: Alexandre de Bauffremont (1773–1833) was prince-duke of Bauffremont. In 1787 he married Marie-Antoinette, daughter of Paul François de Quelen de La Vauguyon. He emigrated to Koblenz on the French Revolution but rallied to Napoleon and accepted the title of comte de l'Empire. He was made a peer of France in 1815 by Louis XVIII. title: Alexandre de Bauffremont
